317  { SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_LOCAL_ROUTES, &NcpBase::NcpBase::RemovePropertyHandler_THREAD_LOCAL_ROUTES },
318  { SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_ON_MESH_NETS, &NcpBase::NcpBase::RemovePropertyHandler_THREAD_ON_MESH_NETS },
319  { SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_ASSISTING_PORTS, &NcpBase::NcpBase::RemovePropertyHandler_THREAD_ASSISTING_PORTS },
320  { SPINEL_PROP_MAC_WHITELIST, &NcpBase::RemovePropertyHandler_MAC_WHITELIST },
321  { SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_ACTIVE_ROUTER_IDS, &NcpBase::RemovePropertyHandler_THREAD_ACTIVE_ROUTER_IDS },
322 };

324 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
325 // MARK: Utility Functions
326 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
327 
328 static spinel_status_t ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(ThreadError error)
329 {
330  spinel_status_t ret;
331 
332  switch (error)
333  {
334  case kThreadError_None:
335  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_OK;
336  break;
337 
338  case kThreadError_Failed:
339  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_FAILURE;
340  break;
341 
342  case kThreadError_Drop:
343  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_DROPPED;
344  break;
345 
346  case kThreadError_NoBufs:
347  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_NOMEM;
348  break;
349 
350  case kThreadError_Busy:
351  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_BUSY;
352  break;
353 
354  case kThreadError_Parse:
355  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR;
356  break;
357 
358  case kThreadError_InvalidArgs:
359  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
360  break;
361 
362  case kThreadError_NotImplemented:
363  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_UNIMPLEMENTED;
364  break;
365 
366  case kThreadError_InvalidState:
367  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_INVALID_STATE;
368  break;
369 
370  case kThreadError_NoAck:
371  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_NO_ACK;
372  break;
373 
374  case kThreadError_ChannelAccessFailure:
375  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_CCA_FAILURE;
376  break;
377 
378  case kThreadError_Already:
379  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_ALREADY;
380  break;
381 
382  case kThreadError_NotFound:
383  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
384  break;
385 
386 
387  default:
388  // Unknown error code. Wrap it as a Spinel status and return that.
389  ret = static_cast<spinel_status_t>(SPINEL_STATUS_STACK_NATIVE__BEGIN + error);
390  break;
391  }
392 
393  return ret;
394 }
395 
396 static spinel_status_t ResetReasonToSpinelStatus(otPlatResetReason reason)
397 {
398  spinel_status_t ret;
399  switch (reason)
400  {
401  case kPlatResetReason_PowerOn:
402  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_POWER_ON;
403  break;
404  case kPlatResetReason_External:
405  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_EXTERNAL;
406  break;
407  case kPlatResetReason_Software:
408  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_SOFTWARE;
409  break;
410  case kPlatResetReason_Fault:
411  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_FAULT;
412  break;
413  case kPlatResetReason_Crash:
414  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_CRASH;
415  break;
416  case kPlatResetReason_Assert:
417  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_ASSERT;
418  break;
419  case kPlatResetReason_Watchdog:
420  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_WATCHDOG;
421  break;
422  case kPlatResetReason_Other:
423  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_OTHER;
424  break;
425  default:
426  ret = SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_UNKNOWN;
427  break;
428  }
429  return ret;
430 }
431 
432 static uint8_t BorderRouterConfigToFlagByte(const otBorderRouterConfig &config)
433 {
434  uint8_t flags(0);
435 
436  if (config.mPreferred)
437  {
438  flags |= SPINEL_NET_FLAG_PREFERRED;
439  }
440 
441  if (config.mSlaac)
442  {
443  flags |= SPINEL_NET_FLAG_SLAAC;
444  }
445 
446  if (config.mDhcp)
447  {
448  flags |= SPINEL_NET_FLAG_DHCP;
449  }
450 
451  if (config.mDefaultRoute)
452  {
453  flags |= SPINEL_NET_FLAG_DEFAULT_ROUTE;
454  }
455 
456  if (config.mConfigure)
457  {
458  flags |= SPINEL_NET_FLAG_CONFIGURE;
459  }
460 
461  if (config.mOnMesh)
462  {
463  flags |= SPINEL_NET_FLAG_ON_MESH;
464  }
465 
466  flags |= (config.mPreference << SPINEL_NET_FLAG_PREFERENCE_OFFSET);
467 
468  return flags;
469 }

475 NcpBase::NcpBase(otInstance *aInstance):
476  mInstance(aInstance),
477  mLastStatus(SPINEL_STATUS_OK),
478  mSupportedChannelMask(kPhySupportedChannelMask),
479  mChannelMask(kPhySupportedChannelMask),
480  mScanPeriod(200), // ms
481  mUpdateChangedPropsTask(aInstance->mIp6.mTaskletScheduler, &NcpBase::UpdateChangedProps, this),
482  mChangedFlags(NCP_PLAT_RESET_REASON),
483  mShouldSignalEndOfScan(false),
484 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_JAM_DETECTION
485  mShouldSignalJamStateChange(false),
486 #endif
487  mDroppedReplyTid(0),
488  mDroppedReplyTidBitSet(0),
489  mNextExpectedTid(0),
490  mAllowLocalNetworkDataChange(false),
491  mRequireJoinExistingNetwork(false),
492  mIsRawStreamEnabled(false),
493  mDisableStreamWrite(false),
494 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
495  mCurTransmitTID(0),
496  mCurReceiveChannel(OPENTHREAD_CONFIG_DEFAULT_CHANNEL),
497  mCurScanChannel(NCP_INVALID_SCAN_CHANNEL),
498 #endif // OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
499 
500  mFramingErrorCounter(0),
501  mRxSpinelFrameCounter(0),
502  mRxSpinelOutOfOrderTidCounter(0),
503  mTxSpinelFrameCounter(0),
504  mInboundSecureIpFrameCounter(0),
505  mInboundInsecureIpFrameCounter(0),
506  mOutboundSecureIpFrameCounter(0),
507  mOutboundInsecureIpFrameCounter(0),
508  mDroppedOutboundIpFrameCounter(0),
509  mDroppedInboundIpFrameCounter(0)
510 {
511  assert(mInstance != NULL);
512 
513  sNcpContext = this;
514 
515  otSetStateChangedCallback(mInstance, &NcpBase::HandleNetifStateChanged, this);
516  otSetReceiveIp6DatagramCallback(mInstance, &NcpBase::HandleDatagramFromStack, this);
517  otSetLinkPcapCallback(mInstance, &NcpBase::HandleRawFrame, static_cast<void*>(this));
518  otSetIcmpEchoEnabled(mInstance, false);
519  otSetReceiveIp6DatagramFilterEnabled(mInstance, true);
520 
521  mUpdateChangedPropsTask.Post();
522 
523 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_LEGACY
524  mLegacyNodeDidJoin = false;
525  mLegacyHandlers = NULL;
526  memset(mLegacyUlaPrefix, 0, sizeof(mLegacyUlaPrefix));
527 #endif
528 }

530 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
531 // MARK: Outbound Datagram Handling
532 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
533 
534 void NcpBase::HandleDatagramFromStack(otMessage aMessage, void *aContext)
535 {
536  static_cast<NcpBase *>(aContext)->HandleDatagramFromStack(aMessage);
537 }
538 
539 void NcpBase::HandleDatagramFromStack(otMessage aMessage)
540 {
541  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
542  bool isSecure = otIsMessageLinkSecurityEnabled(aMessage);
543  uint16_t length = otGetMessageLength(aMessage);
544 
545  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
546 
547  SuccessOrExit(
548  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
549  "CiiS",
550  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
551  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
552  isSecure
553  ? SPINEL_PROP_STREAM_NET
554  : SPINEL_PROP_STREAM_NET_INSECURE,
555  length
556  ));
557 
558  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedMessage(aMessage));
559 
560  // Set the aMessage pointer to NULL, to indicate that it does not need to be freed at the exit.
561  // The aMessage is now owned by the OutboundFrame and will be freed when the frame is either successfully sent and
562  // then removed, or if the frame gets discarded.
563  aMessage = NULL;
564 
565  // Append any metadata (rssi, lqi, channel, etc) here!
566 
567  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
568 
569 exit:
570 
571  if (aMessage != NULL)
572  {
573  otFreeMessage(aMessage);
574  }
575 
576  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
577  {
578  SendLastStatus(SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0, SPINEL_STATUS_DROPPED);
579  mDroppedOutboundIpFrameCounter++;
580  }
581  else
582  {
583  if (isSecure)
584  {
585  mOutboundSecureIpFrameCounter++;
586  }
587  else
588  {
589  mOutboundInsecureIpFrameCounter++;
590  }
591  }
592 }
593 
594 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
595 // MARK: Raw frame handling
596 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
597 
598 void NcpBase::HandleRawFrame(const RadioPacket *aFrame, void *aContext)
599 {
600  static_cast<NcpBase *>(aContext)->HandleRawFrame(aFrame);
601 }
602 
603 void NcpBase::HandleRawFrame(const RadioPacket *aFrame)
604 {
605  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
606  uint16_t flags = 0;
607 
608  if (!mIsRawStreamEnabled)
609  {
610  goto exit;
611  }
612 
613  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
614 
615  if (aFrame->mDidTX)
616  {
617  flags |= SPINEL_MD_FLAG_TX;
618  }
619 
620  // Append frame header and frame length
621  SuccessOrExit(
622  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
623  "CiiS",
624  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
625  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
626  SPINEL_PROP_STREAM_RAW,
627  aFrame->mLength
628  )
629  );
630 
631  // Append the frame contents
632  SuccessOrExit(
633  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedData(
634  aFrame->mPsdu,
635  aFrame->mLength
636  )
637  );
638 
639  // Append metadata (rssi, etc)
640  SuccessOrExit(
641  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
642  "ccS",
643  aFrame->mPower, // TX Power
644  -128, // Noise Floor (Currently unused)
645  flags // Flags
646 
647  // Skip PHY and Vendor data for now
648  )
649  );
650 
651  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
652 
653 exit:
654  return;
655 }
656

658 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
659 // MARK: Scan Results Glue
660 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
661 
662 void NcpBase::HandleActiveScanResult_Jump(otActiveScanResult *aResult, void *aContext)
663 {
664  static_cast<NcpBase *>(aContext)->HandleActiveScanResult(aResult);
665 }
666 
667 void NcpBase::HandleActiveScanResult(otActiveScanResult *result)
668 {
669  ThreadError errorCode;
670 
671  if (result)
672  {
673  uint8_t flags = static_cast<uint8_t>(result->mVersion << SPINEL_BEACON_THREAD_FLAG_VERSION_SHIFT);
674 
675  if (result->mIsJoinable)
676  {
677  flags |= SPINEL_BEACON_THREAD_FLAG_JOINABLE;
678  }
679 
680  if (result->mIsNative)
681  {
682  flags |= SPINEL_BEACON_THREAD_FLAG_NATIVE;
683  }
684 
685  //chan,rssi,(laddr,saddr,panid,lqi),(proto,flags,networkid,xpanid) [icT(ESSC)T(iCUD.).]
686  NcpBase::SendPropertyUpdate(
687  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
688  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_INSERTED,
689  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_SCAN_BEACON,
690  "CcT(ESSC.)T(iCUD.).",
691  result->mChannel,
692  result->mRssi,
693  result->mExtAddress.m8, // laddr
694  0xFFFF, // saddr, Not given
695  result->mPanId,
696  result->mLqi,
697  SPINEL_PROTOCOL_TYPE_THREAD,
698  flags,
699  result->mNetworkName.m8,
700  result->mExtendedPanId.m8, OT_EXT_PAN_ID_SIZE
701  );
702  }
703  else
704  {
705  // We are finished with the scan, so send out
706  // a property update indicating such.
707  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
708  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
709  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
710  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_SCAN_STATE,
711  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
712  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE
713  );
714 
715  // If we could not send the end of scan inidciator message now (no
716  // buffer space), we set `mShouldSignalEndOfScan` to true to send
717  // it out when buffer space becomes available.
718  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
719  {
720  mShouldSignalEndOfScan = true;
721  }
722  }
723 }
724 
725 void NcpBase::HandleEnergyScanResult_Jump(otEnergyScanResult *aResult, void *aContext)
726 {
727  static_cast<NcpBase *>(aContext)->HandleEnergyScanResult(aResult);
728 }
729 
730 void NcpBase::HandleEnergyScanResult(otEnergyScanResult *aResult)
731 {
732  ThreadError errorCode;
733 
734  if (aResult)
735  {
736  NcpBase::SendPropertyUpdate(
737  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
738  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_INSERTED,
739  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_ENERGY_SCAN_RESULT,
740  "Cc",
741  aResult->mChannel,
742  aResult->mMaxRssi
743  );
744  }
745  else
746  {
747  // We are finished with the scan, so send out
748  // a property update indicating such.
749  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
750  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
751  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
752  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_SCAN_STATE,
753  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
754  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE
755  );
756 
757  // If we could not send the end of scan indicator message now (no
758  // buffer space), we set `mShouldSignalEndOfScan` to true to send
759  // it out when buffer space becomes available.
760  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
761  {
762  mShouldSignalEndOfScan = true;
763  }
764  }
765 }

771 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
772 
773 void NcpBase::LinkRawReceiveDone(otInstance *, RadioPacket *aPacket, ThreadError aError)
774 {
775  sNcpContext->LinkRawReceiveDone(aPacket, aError);
776 }
777 
778 void NcpBase::LinkRawReceiveDone(RadioPacket *aPacket, ThreadError aError)
779 {
780  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
781  uint16_t flags = 0;
782 
783  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
784 
785  if (aPacket->mDidTX)
786  {
787  flags |= SPINEL_MD_FLAG_TX;
788  }
789 
790  // Append frame header and frame length
791  SuccessOrExit(
792  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
793  "CiiS",
794  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
795  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
796  SPINEL_PROP_STREAM_RAW,
797  (aError == kThreadError_None) ? aPacket->mLength : 0
798  )
799  );
800 
801  if (aError == kThreadError_None)
802  {
803  // Append the frame contents
804  SuccessOrExit(
805  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedData(
806  aPacket->mPsdu,
807  aPacket->mLength
808  )
809  );
810  }
811 
812  // Append metadata (rssi, etc)
813  SuccessOrExit(
814  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
815  "ccSiCC",
816  aPacket->mPower, // TX Power
817  -128, // Noise Floor (Currently unused)
818  flags, // Flags
819  aError, // Receive error
820  aPacket->mChannel, // Receive channel
821  aPacket->mLqi // Link quality indicator
822  )
823  );
824 
825  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
826 
827 exit:
828  return;
829 }
830 
831 void NcpBase::LinkRawTransmitDone(otInstance *, RadioPacket *aPacket, bool aFramePending, ThreadError aError)
832 {
833  sNcpContext->LinkRawTransmitDone(aPacket, aFramePending, aError);
834 }
835 
836 void NcpBase::LinkRawTransmitDone(RadioPacket *, bool aFramePending, ThreadError aError)
837 {
838  if (mCurTransmitTID)
839  {
840  SendPropertyUpdate(
841  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0 | mCurTransmitTID,
842  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
843  SPINEL_PROP_LAST_STATUS,
844  "ib",
845  aError,
846  aFramePending
847  );
848 
849  // Clear cached transmit TID
850  mCurTransmitTID = 0;
851  }
852 
853  // Make sure we are back listening on the original receive channel,
854  // since the transmit could have been on a different channel.
855  otLinkRawReceive(mInstance, mCurReceiveChannel, &NcpBase::LinkRawReceiveDone);
856 }
857 
858 void NcpBase::LinkRawEnergyScanDone(otInstance *, int8_t aEnergyScanMaxRssi)
859 {
860  sNcpContext->LinkRawEnergyScanDone(aEnergyScanMaxRssi);
861 }
862 
863 void NcpBase::LinkRawEnergyScanDone(int8_t aEnergyScanMaxRssi)
864 {
865  SendPropertyUpdate(
866  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
867  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
868  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_ENERGY_SCAN_RESULT,
869  "Cc",
870  mCurScanChannel,
871  aEnergyScanMaxRssi
872  );
873 
874  // Clear current scan channel
875  mCurScanChannel = NCP_INVALID_SCAN_CHANNEL;
876 
877  // Make sure we are back listening on the original receive channel,
878  // since the energy scan could have been on a different channel.
879  otLinkRawReceive(mInstance, mCurReceiveChannel, &NcpBase::LinkRawReceiveDone);
880 
881  // We are finished with the scan, so send out
882  // a property update indicating such.
883  SendPropertyUpdate(
884  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
885  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
886  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_SCAN_STATE,
887  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
888  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE
889  );
890 }

894 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
895 // MARK: Address Table Changed Glue
896 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
897 
898 void NcpBase::HandleNetifStateChanged(uint32_t flags, void *context)
899 {
900  NcpBase *obj = static_cast<NcpBase *>(context);
901 
902  obj->mChangedFlags |= flags;
903 
904  obj->mUpdateChangedPropsTask.Post();
905 }
906 
907 void NcpBase::UpdateChangedProps(void *context)
908 {
909  NcpBase *obj = static_cast<NcpBase *>(context);
910  obj->UpdateChangedProps();
911 }
912 
913 void NcpBase::UpdateChangedProps(void)
914 {
915  while (mChangedFlags != 0)
916  {
917  if ((mChangedFlags & NCP_PLAT_RESET_REASON) != 0)
918  {
919  SuccessOrExit(SendLastStatus(
920  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
921  ResetReasonToSpinelStatus(otPlatGetResetReason(mInstance))
922  ));
923  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(NCP_PLAT_RESET_REASON);
924  }
925  else if ((mChangedFlags & OT_IP6_LL_ADDR_CHANGED) != 0)
926  {
927  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
928  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
929  SPINEL_PROP_IPV6_LL_ADDR
930  ));
931  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_IP6_LL_ADDR_CHANGED);
932  }
933  else if ((mChangedFlags & OT_IP6_ML_ADDR_CHANGED) != 0)
934  {
935  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
936  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
937  SPINEL_PROP_IPV6_ML_ADDR
938  ));
939  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_IP6_ML_ADDR_CHANGED);
940  }
941  else if ((mChangedFlags & OT_NET_ROLE) != 0)
942  {
943  if (mRequireJoinExistingNetwork)
944  {
945  switch (otGetDeviceRole(mInstance))
946  {
947  case kDeviceRoleDetached:
948  case kDeviceRoleDisabled:
949  break;
950 
951  default:
952  mRequireJoinExistingNetwork = false;
953  break;
954  }
955 
956  if ( (otGetDeviceRole(mInstance) == kDeviceRoleLeader)
957  && otIsSingleton(mInstance)
958 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_LEGACY
959  && !mLegacyNodeDidJoin
960 #endif
961  ) {
962  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_NET_PARTITION_ID);
963  otThreadStop(mInstance);
964 
965  // TODO: It would be nice to be able to indicate
966  // something more specific than SPINEL_STATUS_JOIN_FAILURE
967  // here, but it isn't clear how that would work
968  // with the current OpenThread API.
969 
970  SuccessOrExit(SendLastStatus(
971  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
972  SPINEL_STATUS_JOIN_FAILURE
973  ));
974 
975  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
976  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
977  SPINEL_PROP_NET_STACK_UP
978  ));
979  }
980 
981  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
982  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
983  SPINEL_PROP_NET_REQUIRE_JOIN_EXISTING
984  ));
985  }
986 
987  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
988  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
989  SPINEL_PROP_NET_ROLE
990  ));
991  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_NET_ROLE);
992  }
993  else if ((mChangedFlags & OT_NET_PARTITION_ID) != 0)
994  {
995  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
996  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
997  SPINEL_PROP_NET_PARTITION_ID
998  ));
999  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_NET_PARTITION_ID);
1000  }
1001  else if ((mChangedFlags & OT_NET_KEY_SEQUENCE_COUNTER) != 0)
1002  {
1003  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
1004  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1005  SPINEL_PROP_NET_KEY_SEQUENCE_COUNTER
1006  ));
1007  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_NET_KEY_SEQUENCE_COUNTER);
1008  }
1009  else if ((mChangedFlags & (OT_IP6_ADDRESS_ADDED | OT_IP6_ADDRESS_REMOVED)) != 0)
1010  {
1011  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
1012  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1013  SPINEL_PROP_IPV6_ADDRESS_TABLE
1014  ));
1015  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_IP6_ADDRESS_ADDED | OT_IP6_ADDRESS_REMOVED);
1016  }
1017  else if ((mChangedFlags & (OT_THREAD_CHILD_ADDED | OT_THREAD_CHILD_REMOVED)) != 0)
1018  {
1019  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
1020  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1021  SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_CHILD_TABLE
1022  ));
1023  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_THREAD_CHILD_ADDED | OT_THREAD_CHILD_REMOVED);
1024  }
1025  else if ((mChangedFlags & OT_THREAD_NETDATA_UPDATED) != 0)
1026  {
1027  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
1028  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1029  SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_LEADER_NETWORK_DATA
1030  ));
1031 
1032  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_THREAD_NETDATA_UPDATED);
1033 
1034  // If the network data is updated, after successfully sending (or queuing) the
1035  // network data spinel message, we add `NCP_ON_MESH_NETS_CHANGED_BIT_FLAG` to
1036  // the `mChangedFlags` so that we separately send the list of on-mesh prefixes.
1037 
1038  mChangedFlags |= NCP_ON_MESH_NETS_CHANGED_BIT_FLAG;
1039  }
1040  else if ((mChangedFlags & NCP_ON_MESH_NETS_CHANGED_BIT_FLAG) != 0)
1041  {
1042  SuccessOrExit(HandleCommandPropertyGet(
1043  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1044  SPINEL_PROP_THREAD_ON_MESH_NETS
1045  ));
1046 
1047  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(NCP_ON_MESH_NETS_CHANGED_BIT_FLAG);
1048  }
1049  else if ((mChangedFlags & (OT_IP6_RLOC_ADDED | OT_IP6_RLOC_REMOVED)) != 0)
1050  {
1051  mChangedFlags &= ~static_cast<uint32_t>(OT_IP6_RLOC_ADDED | OT_IP6_RLOC_REMOVED);
1052  }
1053  }
1054 
1055 exit:
1056  return;
1057 }
1058 
1059 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1060 // MARK: Serial Traffic Glue
1061 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1062 
1063 ThreadError NcpBase::OutboundFrameSend(void)
1064 {
1065  ThreadError errorCode;
1066 
1067  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameEnd());
1068 
1069  mTxSpinelFrameCounter++;
1070 
1071 exit:
1072  return errorCode;
1073 }
1074 
1075 void NcpBase::HandleReceive(const uint8_t *buf, uint16_t bufLength)
1076 {
1077  uint8_t header = 0;
1078  unsigned int command = 0;
1079  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
1080  const uint8_t *arg_ptr = NULL;
1081  unsigned int arg_len = 0;
1082  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1083  spinel_tid_t tid = 0;
1084 
1085  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(buf, bufLength, "CiD", &header, &command, &arg_ptr, &arg_len);
1086  tid = SPINEL_HEADER_GET_TID(header);
1087 
1088  if (parsedLength == bufLength)
1089  {
1090  errorCode = HandleCommand(header, command, arg_ptr, static_cast<uint16_t>(arg_len));
1091 
1092  // Check if we may have missed a `tid` in the sequence.
1093  if ((mNextExpectedTid != 0) && (tid != mNextExpectedTid))
1094  {
1095  mRxSpinelOutOfOrderTidCounter++;
1096  }
1097 
1098  mNextExpectedTid = SPINEL_GET_NEXT_TID(tid);
1099  }
1100  else
1101  {
1102  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
1103  }
1104 
1105  if (errorCode == kThreadError_NoBufs)
1106  {
1107  // If we cannot send a response due to buffer space not being
1108  // available, we remember the TID of command so to send an
1109  // error status when buffer space becomes available later.
1110 
1111  // Valid TID range is 1-15 (zero being used as special case
1112  // where no reply is expected). TIDs for dropped reply are
1113  // stored in two variables: `mDroppedReplyTidBitSet` which
1114  // is a bit set (bits 1-15 correspond to TID values 1-15).
1115  // The first/next dropped TID value in the set is stored in
1116  // `mDroppedReplyTid` (with value zero indicating that there
1117  // is no dropped reply).
1118 
1119  if (tid != 0)
1120  {
1121  if (mDroppedReplyTid == 0)
1122  {
1123  mDroppedReplyTid = tid;
1124  }
1125 
1126  mDroppedReplyTidBitSet |= (1 << tid);
1127  }
1128  }
1129 
1130  mRxSpinelFrameCounter++;
1131 }
1132 
1133 void NcpBase::HandleSpaceAvailableInTxBuffer(void)
1134 {
1135  while (mDroppedReplyTid != 0)
1136  {
1137  SuccessOrExit(
1138  SendLastStatus(
1139  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0 | mDroppedReplyTid,
1140  SPINEL_STATUS_NOMEM
1141  )
1142  );
1143 
1144  mDroppedReplyTidBitSet &= ~(1 << mDroppedReplyTid);
1145 
1146  if (mDroppedReplyTidBitSet == 0)
1147  {
1148  mDroppedReplyTid = 0;
1149 
1150  break;
1151  }
1152 
1153  do
1154  {
1155  mDroppedReplyTid = SPINEL_GET_NEXT_TID(mDroppedReplyTid);
1156  }
1157  while ((mDroppedReplyTidBitSet & (1 << mDroppedReplyTid)) == 0);
1158  }
1159 
1160  if (mShouldSignalEndOfScan)
1161  {
1162  SuccessOrExit(
1163  SendPropertyUpdate(
1164  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1165  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1166  SPINEL_PROP_MAC_SCAN_STATE,
1167  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
1168  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE
1169  ));
1170 
1171  mShouldSignalEndOfScan = false;
1172  }
1173 
1174 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_JAM_DETECTION
1175  if (mShouldSignalJamStateChange)
1176  {
1177  SuccessOrExit(
1178  SendPropertyUpdate(
1179  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
1180  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1181  SPINEL_PROP_JAM_DETECTED,
1182  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S,
1183  otGetJamDetectionState(mInstance)
1184  ));
1185 
1186  mShouldSignalJamStateChange = false;
1187  }
1188 #endif // OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_JAM_DETECTION
1189 
1190  UpdateChangedProps();
1191 
1192 exit:
1193  return;
1194 }
1195 
1196 void NcpBase::IncrementFrameErrorCounter(void)
1197 {
1198  mFramingErrorCounter++;
1199 }

1201 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1202 // MARK: Inbound Command Handlers
1203 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1204 
1205 ThreadError NcpBase::HandleCommand(uint8_t header, unsigned int command, const uint8_t *arg_ptr, uint16_t arg_len)
1206 {
1207  unsigned i;
1208  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1209 
1210  // Skip if this isn't a spinel frame
1211  VerifyOrExit((SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG & header) == SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG, errorCode = kThreadError_InvalidArgs);
1212 
1213  // We only support IID zero for now.
1214  VerifyOrExit(
1215  SPINEL_HEADER_GET_IID(header) == 0,
1216  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_INVALID_INTERFACE)
1217  );
1218 
1219  for (i = 0; i < sizeof(mCommandHandlerTable) / sizeof(mCommandHandlerTable[0]); i++)
1220  {
1221  if (mCommandHandlerTable[i].mCommand == command)
1222  {
1223  break;
1224  }
1225  }
1226 
1227  if (i < sizeof(mCommandHandlerTable) / sizeof(mCommandHandlerTable[0]))
1228  {
1229  errorCode = (this->*mCommandHandlerTable[i].mHandler)(header, command, arg_ptr, arg_len);
1230  }
1231  else
1232  {
1233  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_INVALID_COMMAND);
1234  }
1235 
1236 exit:
1237  return errorCode;
1238 }
1239 
1240 ThreadError NcpBase::HandleCommandPropertyGet(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
1241 {
1242  unsigned i;
1243  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1244 
1245  for (i = 0; i < sizeof(mGetPropertyHandlerTable) / sizeof(mGetPropertyHandlerTable[0]); i++)
1246  {
1247  if (mGetPropertyHandlerTable[i].mPropKey == key)
1248  {
1249  break;
1250  }
1251  }
1252 
1253  if (i < sizeof(mGetPropertyHandlerTable) / sizeof(mGetPropertyHandlerTable[0]))
1254  {
1255  errorCode = (this->*mGetPropertyHandlerTable[i].mHandler)(header, key);
1256  }
1257  else
1258  {
1259  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PROP_NOT_FOUND);
1260  }
1261 
1262  return errorCode;
1263 }

1348 
1349 ThreadError NcpBase::SendLastStatus(uint8_t header, spinel_status_t lastStatus)
1350 {
1351  if (SPINEL_HEADER_GET_IID(header) == 0)
1352  {
1353  mLastStatus = lastStatus;
1354  }
1355 
1356  return SendPropertyUpdate(
1357  header,
1358  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1359  SPINEL_PROP_LAST_STATUS,
1360  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S,
1361  lastStatus
1362  );
1363 }
1364 
1365 ThreadError NcpBase::SendPropertyUpdate(uint8_t header, uint8_t command, spinel_prop_key_t key,
1366  const char *pack_format, ...)
1367 {
1368  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1369  va_list args;
1370 
1371  va_start(args, pack_format);
1372  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
1373  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, command, key));
1374  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedVPacked(pack_format, args));
1375  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
1376 
1377 exit:
1378  va_end(args);
1379  return errorCode;
1380 }
1381 
1382 ThreadError NcpBase::SendPropertyUpdate(uint8_t header, uint8_t command, spinel_prop_key_t key,
1383  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
1384 {
1385  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1386 
1387  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
1388  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, command, key));
1389  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedData(value_ptr, value_len));
1390  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
1391 
1392 exit:
1393  return errorCode;
1394 }
1395 
1396 ThreadError NcpBase::SendPropertyUpdate(uint8_t header, uint8_t command, spinel_prop_key_t key, otMessage aMessage)
1397 {
1398  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1399 
1400  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
1401  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, command, key));
1402  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedMessage(aMessage));
1403 
1404  // Set the aMessage pointer to NULL, to indicate that it does not need to be freed at the exit.
1405  // The message is now owned by the OutboundFrame and will be freed when the frame is either successfully sent and
1406  // then removed, or if the frame gets discarded.
1407  aMessage = NULL;
1408 
1409  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
1410 
1411 exit:
1412 
1413  if (aMessage != NULL)
1414  {
1415  otFreeMessage(aMessage);
1416  }
1417 
1418  return errorCode;
1419 }
1420 
1421 ThreadError NcpBase::OutboundFrameFeedVPacked(const char *pack_format, va_list args)
1422 {
1423  uint8_t buf[64];
1424  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_NoBufs;
1425  spinel_ssize_t packed_len;
1426 
1427  packed_len = spinel_datatype_vpack(buf, sizeof(buf), pack_format, args);
1428 
1429  if ((packed_len > 0) && (packed_len <= static_cast<spinel_ssize_t>(sizeof(buf))))
1430  {
1431  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedData(buf, static_cast<uint16_t>(packed_len));
1432  }
1433 
1434  return errorCode;
1435 }
1436 
1437 ThreadError NcpBase::OutboundFrameFeedPacked(const char *pack_format, ...)
1438 {
1439  ThreadError errorCode;
1440  va_list args;
1441 
1442  va_start(args, pack_format);
1443  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedVPacked(pack_format, args);
1444  va_end(args);
1445 
1446  return errorCode;
1447 }

1461 
1462 ThreadError NcpBase::CommandHandler_RESET(uint8_t header, unsigned int command, const uint8_t *arg_ptr,
1463  uint16_t arg_len)
1464 {
1465  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1466 
1467  // We aren't using any of the arguments to this function.
1468  (void)header;
1469  (void)command;
1470  (void)arg_ptr;
1471  (void)arg_len;
1472 
1473  // Signal a platform reset. If implemented, this function
1474  // shouldn't return.
1475  otPlatformReset(mInstance);
1476 
1477  // We only get to this point if the
1478  // platform doesn't support resetting.
1479  // In such a case we fake it.
1480 
1481  otThreadStop(mInstance);
1482  otInterfaceDown(mInstance);
1483 
1484  errorCode = SendLastStatus(SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0, SPINEL_STATUS_RESET_SOFTWARE);
1485 
1486  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
1487  {
1488  mChangedFlags |= NCP_PLAT_RESET_REASON;
1489  mUpdateChangedPropsTask.Post();
1490  }
1491 
1492  return errorCode;
1493 }

1495 ThreadError NcpBase::CommandHandler_PROP_VALUE_GET(uint8_t header, unsigned int command, const uint8_t *arg_ptr,
1496  uint16_t arg_len)
1497 {
1498  unsigned int propKey = 0;
1499  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
1500  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1501 
1502  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(arg_ptr, arg_len, "i", &propKey);
1503 
1504  if (parsedLength > 0)
1505  {
1506  errorCode = HandleCommandPropertyGet(header, static_cast<spinel_prop_key_t>(propKey));
1507  }
1508  else
1509  {
1510  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
1511  }
1512 
1513  (void)command;
1514 
1515  return errorCode;
1516 }

1670 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_CAPS(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
1671 {
1672  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1673 
1674  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
1675  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS, key));
1676 
1677  // Begin adding capabilities //////////////////////////////////////////////
1678 
1679  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_NET_THREAD_1_0));
1680  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_COUNTERS));
1681  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_MAC_WHITELIST));
1682 
1683 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
1684  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_MAC_RAW));
1685 #endif
1686 
1687 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_JAM_DETECTION
1688  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_JAM_DETECT));
1689 #endif
1690 
1691  // TODO: Somehow get the following capability from the radio.
1692  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S,
1693  SPINEL_CAP_802_15_4_2450MHZ_OQPSK));
1694 
1695 #if OPENTHREAD_CONFIG_MAX_CHILDREN > 0
1696  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_ROLE_ROUTER));
1697 #endif
1698 
1699 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_LEGACY
1700  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT_PACKED_S, SPINEL_CAP_NEST_LEGACY_INTERFACE));
1701 #endif
1702 
1703  // End adding capabilities /////////////////////////////////////////////////
1704 
1705  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
1706 
1707 exit:
1708  return errorCode;
1709 }

1782 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_PHY_FREQ(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
1783 {
1784  uint32_t freq_khz(0);
1785  const uint8_t chan(otGetChannel(mInstance));
1786 
1787  if (chan == 0)
1788  {
1789  freq_khz = 868300;
1790  }
1791  else if (chan < 11)
1792  {
1793  freq_khz = 906000 - (2000 * 1) + 2000 * (chan);
1794  }
1795  else if (chan < 26)
1796  {
1797  freq_khz = 2405000 - (5000 * 11) + 5000 * (chan);
1798  }
1799 
1800  return SendPropertyUpdate(
1801  header,
1802  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1803  key,
1804  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT32_S,
1805  freq_khz
1806  );
1807 }

1847 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_MAC_SCAN_STATE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
1848 {
1849  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1850 
1851 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
1852  if (otLinkRawIsEnabled(mInstance))
1853  {
1854  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
1855  header,
1856  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1857  key,
1858  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
1859  mCurScanChannel == NCP_INVALID_SCAN_CHANNEL ?
1860  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE :
1861  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_ENERGY
1862  );
1863  }
1864  else
1865 #endif // OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
1866  if (otIsActiveScanInProgress(mInstance))
1867  {
1868  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
1869  header,
1870  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1871  key,
1872  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
1873  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_BEACON
1874  );
1875  }
1876  else if (otIsEnergyScanInProgress(mInstance))
1877  {
1878  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
1879  header,
1880  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1881  key,
1882  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
1883  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_ENERGY
1884  );
1885  }
1886  else
1887  {
1888  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
1889  header,
1890  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
1891  key,
1892  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
1893  SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE
1894  );
1895  }
1896 
1897  return errorCode;
1898 }

1911 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_ChannelMaskHelper(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key, uint32_t channel_mask)
1912 {
1913  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
1914 
1915  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
1916  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS, key));
1917 
1918  for (int i = 0; i < 32; i++)
1919  {
1920  if (0 != (channel_mask & (1 << i)))
1921  {
1922  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S, i));
1923  }
1924  }
1925 
1926  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
1927 
1928 exit:
1929  return errorCode;
1930 }

2038 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_NET_ROLE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
2039 {
2040  spinel_net_role_t role(SPINEL_NET_ROLE_DETACHED);
2041 
2042  switch (otGetDeviceRole(mInstance))
2043  {
2044  case kDeviceRoleOffline:
2045  case kDeviceRoleDisabled:
2046  case kDeviceRoleDetached:
2047  role = SPINEL_NET_ROLE_DETACHED;
2048  break;
2049 
2050  case kDeviceRoleChild:
2051  role = SPINEL_NET_ROLE_CHILD;
2052  break;
2053 
2054  case kDeviceRoleRouter:
2055  role = SPINEL_NET_ROLE_ROUTER;
2056  break;
2057 
2058  case kDeviceRoleLeader:
2059  role = SPINEL_NET_ROLE_LEADER;
2060  break;
2061  }
2062 
2063  return SendPropertyUpdate(
2064  header,
2065  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
2066  key,
2067  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
2068  role
2069  );
2070 }

2339 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_THREAD_CHILD_TABLE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
2340 {
2341  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
2342  otChildInfo childInfo;
2343  uint8_t maxChildren;
2344  uint8_t modeFlags;
2345 
2346  mDisableStreamWrite = true;
2347 
2348  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
2349  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS, key));
2350 
2351  maxChildren = otGetMaxAllowedChildren(mInstance);
2352 
2353  for (uint8_t index = 0; index < maxChildren; index++)
2354  {
2355  errorCode = otGetChildInfoByIndex(mInstance, index, &childInfo);
2356 
2357  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
2358  {
2359  continue;
2360  }
2361 
2362  modeFlags = 0;
2363 
2364  if (childInfo.mRxOnWhenIdle)
2365  {
2366  modeFlags |= kThreadMode_RxOnWhenIdle;
2367  }
2368 
2369  if (childInfo.mSecureDataRequest)
2370  {
2371  modeFlags |= kThreadMode_SecureDataRequest;
2372  }
2373 
2374  if (childInfo.mFullFunction)
2375  {
2376  modeFlags |= kThreadMode_FullFunctionDevice;
2377  }
2378 
2379  if (childInfo.mFullNetworkData)
2380  {
2381  modeFlags |= kThreadMode_FullNetworkData;
2382  }
2383 
2384  SuccessOrExit(
2385  errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
2386  "T("
2387  SPINEL_DATATYPE_EUI64_S // EUI64 Address
2388  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT16_S // Rloc16
2389  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT32_S // Timeout
2390  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT32_S // Age
2391  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Network Data Version
2392  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Link Quality In
2393  SPINEL_DATATYPE_INT8_S // Average RSS
2394  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Mode (flags)
2395  ")",
2396  childInfo.mExtAddress.m8,
2397  childInfo.mRloc16,
2398  childInfo.mTimeout,
2399  childInfo.mAge,
2400  childInfo.mNetworkDataVersion,
2401  childInfo.mLinkQualityIn,
2402  childInfo.mAverageRssi,
2403  modeFlags
2404  ));
2405  }
2406 
2407  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
2408 
2409 exit:
2410  mDisableStreamWrite = false;
2411  return errorCode;
2412 }

2524 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_THREAD_ON_MESH_NETS(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
2525 {
2526  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
2527  otBorderRouterConfig border_router_config;
2528  uint8_t flags;
2529 
2530  mDisableStreamWrite = true;
2531 
2532  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
2533  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS, key));
2534 
2535  // Fill from non-local network data first
2536  for (otNetworkDataIterator iter = OT_NETWORK_DATA_ITERATOR_INIT ;;)
2537  {
2538  errorCode = otGetNextOnMeshPrefix(mInstance, false, &iter, &border_router_config);
2539 
2540  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
2541  {
2542  break;
2543  }
2544 
2545  flags = BorderRouterConfigToFlagByte(border_router_config);
2546 
2547  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
2548  "T("
2549  SPINEL_DATATYPE_IPv6ADDR_S // IPv6 Prefix
2550  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Prefix Length (in bits)
2551  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S // isStable
2552  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Flags
2553  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S // isLocal
2554  ").",
2555  &border_router_config.mPrefix,
2556  64,
2557  border_router_config.mStable,
2558  flags,
2559  true
2560  ));
2561  }
2562 
2563  // Fill from local network data last
2564  for (otNetworkDataIterator iter = OT_NETWORK_DATA_ITERATOR_INIT ;;)
2565  {
2566  errorCode = otGetNextOnMeshPrefix(mInstance, true, &iter, &border_router_config);
2567 
2568  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
2569  {
2570  break;
2571  }
2572 
2573  flags = BorderRouterConfigToFlagByte(border_router_config);
2574 
2575  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked(
2576  "T("
2577  SPINEL_DATATYPE_IPv6ADDR_S // IPv6 Prefix
2578  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Prefix Length (in bits)
2579  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S // isStable
2580  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S // Flags
2581  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S // isLocal
2582  ").",
2583  &border_router_config.mPrefix,
2584  64,
2585  border_router_config.mStable,
2586  flags,
2587  false
2588  ));
2589  }
2590 
2591  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
2592 
2593 exit:
2594  mDisableStreamWrite = false;
2595  return errorCode;
2596 }

2625  header,

2994  break;

2996  case SPINEL_PROP_CNTR_RX_IP_INSEC_TOTAL:
2997  value = mOutboundInsecureIpFrameCounter;
2998  break;
2999 
3000  case SPINEL_PROP_CNTR_RX_IP_DROPPED:
3001  value = mDroppedOutboundIpFrameCounter;
3002  break;
3003 
3004  case SPINEL_PROP_CNTR_TX_SPINEL_TOTAL:
3005  value = mTxSpinelFrameCounter;
3006  break;
3007

3010  break;

3014  break;
3015 
3016  case SPINEL_PROP_CNTR_RX_SPINEL_ERR:
3017  value = mFramingErrorCounter;
3018  break;
3019 
3020  default:
3021  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR);
3022  goto bail;
3023  break;
3024  }
3025 
3026  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
3027  header,
3028  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
3029  key,
3030  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT32_S,
3031  value
3032  );
3033 
3034 bail:

3071 ThreadError NcpBase::GetPropertyHandler_MAC_WHITELIST(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key)
3072 {
3073  otMacWhitelistEntry entry;
3074  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
3075 
3076  mDisableStreamWrite = true;
3077 
3078  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameBegin());
3079  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("Cii", header, SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS, key));
3080 
3081  for (uint8_t i = 0; (i != 255) && (errorCode == kThreadError_None); i++)
3082  {
3083  errorCode = otGetMacWhitelistEntry(mInstance, i, &entry);
3084 
3085  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
3086  {
3087  break;
3088  }
3089 
3090  if (entry.mValid)
3091  {
3092  if (!entry.mFixedRssi)
3093  {
3094  entry.mRssi = RSSI_OVERRIDE_DISABLED;
3095  }
3096 
3097  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameFeedPacked("T(Ec).", entry.mExtAddress.m8, entry.mRssi));
3098  }
3099  }
3100 
3101  SuccessOrExit(errorCode = OutboundFrameSend());
3102 
3103 exit:
3104  mDisableStreamWrite = false;
3105  return errorCode;
3106 }

3558 bool HasOnly1BitSet(uint32_t aValue)
3559 {
3560  return aValue != 0 && ((aValue & (aValue-1)) == 0);
3561 }
3562 
3563 uint8_t IndexOfMSB(uint32_t aValue)
3564 {
3565  uint8_t index = 0;
3566  while (aValue >>= 1)
3567  {
3568  index++;
3569  }
3570  return index;
3571 }

3573 ThreadError NcpBase::SetPropertyHandler_MAC_SCAN_STATE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key, const uint8_t *value_ptr,
3574  uint16_t value_len)
3575 {
3576  uint8_t i = 0;
3577  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
3578  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
3579 
3580  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
3581  value_ptr,
3582  value_len,
3583  SPINEL_DATATYPE_UINT8_S,
3584  &i
3585  );
3586 
3587  if (parsedLength > 0)
3588  {
3589  switch (i)
3590  {
3591  case SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_IDLE:
3592  errorCode = kThreadError_None;
3593  break;
3594 
3595  case SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_BEACON:
3596 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
3597  if (otLinkRawIsEnabled(mInstance))
3598  {
3599  errorCode = kThreadError_NotImplemented;
3600  }
3601  else
3602 #endif // OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
3603  {
3604  errorCode = otActiveScan(
3605  mInstance,
3606  mChannelMask,
3607  mScanPeriod,
3608  &HandleActiveScanResult_Jump,
3609  this
3610  );
3611  }
3612 
3613  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
3614  {
3615  mShouldSignalEndOfScan = false;
3616  }
3617 
3618  break;
3619 
3620  case SPINEL_SCAN_STATE_ENERGY:
3621 #if OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
3622  if (otLinkRawIsEnabled(mInstance))
3623  {
3624  // Make sure we aren't already scanning and that we have
3625  // only 1 bit set for the channel mask.
3626  if (mCurScanChannel == NCP_INVALID_SCAN_CHANNEL)
3627  {
3628  if (HasOnly1BitSet(mChannelMask))
3629  {
3630  uint8_t scanChannel = IndexOfMSB(mChannelMask);
3631  mCurScanChannel = (int8_t)scanChannel;
3632 
3633  errorCode = otLinkRawEnergyScan(
3634  mInstance,
3635  scanChannel,
3636  mScanPeriod,
3637  LinkRawEnergyScanDone
3638  );
3639  }
3640  else
3641  {
3642  errorCode = kThreadError_InvalidArgs;
3643  }
3644  }
3645  else
3646  {
3647  errorCode = kThreadError_InvalidState;
3648  }
3649  }
3650  else
3651 #endif // OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API
3652  {
3653  errorCode = otEnergyScan(
3654  mInstance,
3655  mChannelMask,
3656  mScanPeriod,
3657  &HandleEnergyScanResult_Jump,
3658  this
3659  );
3660  }
3661 
3662  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
3663  {
3664  mShouldSignalEndOfScan = false;
3665  }
3666 
3667  break;
3668 
3669  default:
3670  errorCode = kThreadError_InvalidArgs;
3671  break;
3672  }
3673 
3674  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
3675  {
3676  errorCode = HandleCommandPropertyGet(header, key);
3677  }
3678  else
3679  {
3680  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
3681  }
3682  }
3683  else
3684  {
3685  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
3686  }
3687 
3688  return errorCode;
3689 }

3707  errorCode = otSetPanId(mInstance, tmp);

3710  {
3711  errorCode = HandleCommandPropertyGet(header, key);
3712  }

3716  }
3717  }
3718  else
3719  {
3720  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
3721  }
3722 
3723  return errorCode;

3775 ThreadError NcpBase::SetPropertyHandler_STREAM_RAW(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key, const uint8_t *value_ptr,
3776  uint16_t value_len)
3777 {
3778  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
3779 
3780  if (otLinkRawIsEnabled(mInstance))
3781  {
3782  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength(0);
3783  uint8_t *frame_buffer(NULL);
3784  unsigned int frame_len(0);
3785 
3786  RadioPacket *packet = otLinkRawGetTransmitBuffer(mInstance);
3787 
3788  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
3789  value_ptr,
3790  value_len,
3791  "DCc",
3792  &frame_buffer,
3793  &frame_len,
3794  &packet->mChannel,
3795  &packet->mPower
3796  );
3797 
3798  if (parsedLength > 0 && frame_len <= kMaxPHYPacketSize)
3799  {
3800  // Cache the transaction ID for async response
3801  mCurTransmitTID = SPINEL_HEADER_GET_TID(header);
3802 
3803  // Update packet buffer and length
3804  packet->mLength = static_cast<uint8_t>(frame_len);
3805  memcpy(packet->mPsdu, frame_buffer, packet->mLength);
3806 
3807  // Pass packet to the radio layer. Note, this fails if we
3808  // haven't enabled raw stream or are already transmitting.
3809  errorCode = otLinkRawTransmit(mInstance, packet, &NcpBase::LinkRawTransmitDone);
3810  }
3811  else
3812  {
3813  errorCode = kThreadError_Parse;
3814  }
3815  }
3816  else
3817  {
3818  errorCode = kThreadError_InvalidState;
3819  }
3820 
3821  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
3822  {
3823  // Don't do anything here yet. We will complete the transaction when we get a transmit done callback
3824  }
3825  else
3826  {
3827  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
3828  }
3829 
3830  (void)key;
3831 
3832  return errorCode;
3833 }
3834 
3835 #endif // OPENTHREAD_ENABLE_RAW_LINK_API

4194 ThreadError NcpBase::SetPropertyHandler_STREAM_NET_INSECURE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key,
4195  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
4196 {
4197  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
4198  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
4199  const uint8_t *frame_ptr(NULL);
4200  unsigned int frame_len(0);
4201  const uint8_t *meta_ptr(NULL);
4202  unsigned int meta_len(0);
4203 
4204  // STREAM_NET_INSECURE packets are not secured at layer 2.
4205  otMessage message = otNewIp6Message(mInstance, false);
4206 
4207  if (message == NULL)
4208  {
4209  errorCode = kThreadError_NoBufs;
4210  }
4211  else
4212  {
4213  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
4214  value_ptr,
4215  value_len,
4216  SPINEL_DATATYPE_DATA_S SPINEL_DATATYPE_DATA_S,
4217  &frame_ptr,
4218  &frame_len,
4219  &meta_ptr,
4220  &meta_len
4221  );
4222 
4223  // We ignore metadata for now.
4224  // May later include TX power, allow retransmits, etc...
4225  (void)meta_ptr;
4226  (void)meta_len;
4227  (void)parsedLength;
4228 
4229  errorCode = otAppendMessage(message, frame_ptr, static_cast<uint16_t>(frame_len));
4230  }
4231 
4232  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4233  {
4234  // Ensure the insecure message is forwarded using direct transmission.
4235  otMessageSetDirectTransmission(message, true);
4236 
4237  errorCode = otSendIp6Datagram(mInstance, message);
4238  }
4239  else if (message)
4240  {
4241  otFreeMessage(message);
4242  }
4243 
4244  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4245  {
4246  mInboundInsecureIpFrameCounter++;
4247 
4248  if (SPINEL_HEADER_GET_TID(header) != 0)
4249  {
4250  // Only send a successful status update if
4251  // there was a transaction id in the header.
4252  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_OK);
4253  }
4254  }
4255  else
4256  {
4257  mDroppedInboundIpFrameCounter++;
4258 
4259  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
4260  }
4261 
4262  (void)key;
4263 
4264  return errorCode;
4265 }

4420 ThreadError NcpBase::SetPropertyHandler_THREAD_ASSISTING_PORTS(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key,
4421  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
4422 {
4423  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
4424  uint8_t num_entries = 0;
4425  const uint16_t *ports = otGetUnsecurePorts(mInstance, &num_entries);
4426  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength = 1;
4427  int ports_changed = 0;
4428 
4429  // First, we need to remove all of the current assisting ports.
4430  for (; num_entries != 0; ports++, num_entries--)
4431  {
4432  errorCode = otRemoveUnsecurePort(mInstance, *ports);
4433 
4434  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
4435  {
4436  break;
4437  }
4438 
4439  ports_changed++;
4440  }
4441 
4442  while ((errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4443  && (parsedLength > 0)
4444  && (value_len >= 2)
4445  )
4446  {
4447  uint16_t port;
4448 
4449  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
4450  value_ptr,
4451  value_len,
4452  "S",
4453  &port
4454  );
4455 
4456  if (parsedLength > 0)
4457  {
4458  errorCode = otAddUnsecurePort(mInstance, port);
4459  }
4460  else
4461  {
4462  errorCode = kThreadError_Parse;
4463  }
4464 
4465  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
4466  {
4467  break;
4468  }
4469 
4470  value_ptr += parsedLength;
4471  value_len -= parsedLength;
4472 
4473  ports_changed++;
4474  }
4475 
4476  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4477  {
4478  errorCode = HandleCommandPropertyGet(header, key);
4479  }
4480  else
4481  {
4482  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
4483 
4484  if (ports_changed)
4485  {
4486  // We had an error, but we've actually changed
4487  // the state of these ports---so we need to report
4488  // those incomplete changes via an asynchronous
4489  // change event.
4490  HandleCommandPropertyGet(SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0, key);
4491  }
4492  }
4493 
4494  return errorCode;
4495 }
4496 
4497 ThreadError NcpBase::SetPropertyHandler_THREAD_ALLOW_LOCAL_NET_DATA_CHANGE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key,
4498  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
4499 {
4500  bool value = false;
4501  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
4502  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
4503  bool should_register_with_leader = false;
4504 
4505  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
4506  value_ptr,
4507  value_len,
4508  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S,
4509  &value
4510  );
4511 
4512  if (parsedLength > 0)
4513  {
4514  // Register any net data changes on transition from `true` to `false`.
4515  should_register_with_leader = (mAllowLocalNetworkDataChange == true) && (value == false);
4516 
4517  mAllowLocalNetworkDataChange = value;
4518  }
4519  else
4520  {
4521  errorCode = kThreadError_Parse;
4522  }
4523 
4524  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4525  {
4526  errorCode = HandleCommandPropertyGet(header, key);
4527  }
4528  else
4529  {
4530  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
4531  }
4532 
4533  if (should_register_with_leader)
4534  {
4535  otSendServerData(mInstance);
4536  }
4537 
4538  return errorCode;
4539 }

4608 ThreadError NcpBase::SetPropertyHandler_MAC_WHITELIST(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key, const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
4609 {
4610  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
4611  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength = 1;
4612 
4613  // First, clear the whitelist.
4614  otClearMacWhitelist(mInstance);
4615 
4616  while ((errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4617  && (parsedLength > 0)
4618  && (value_len > 0)
4619  )
4620  {
4621  otExtAddress *ext_addr = NULL;
4622  int8_t rssi = RSSI_OVERRIDE_DISABLED;
4623 
4624  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
4625  value_ptr,
4626  value_len,
4627  "T(Ec).",
4628  &ext_addr,
4629  &rssi
4630  );
4631 
4632  if (parsedLength <= 0)
4633  {
4634  rssi = RSSI_OVERRIDE_DISABLED;
4635  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
4636  value_ptr,
4637  value_len,
4638  "T(E).",
4639  &ext_addr
4640  );
4641  }
4642 
4643  if (parsedLength <= 0)
4644  {
4645  errorCode = kThreadError_Parse;
4646  break;
4647  }
4648 
4649  if (rssi == RSSI_OVERRIDE_DISABLED)
4650  {
4651  errorCode = otAddMacWhitelist(mInstance, ext_addr->m8);
4652  }
4653  else
4654  {
4655  errorCode = otAddMacWhitelistRssi(mInstance, ext_addr->m8, rssi);
4656  }
4657 
4658  value_ptr += parsedLength;
4659  value_len -= parsedLength;
4660  }
4661 
4662  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
4663  {
4664  errorCode = HandleCommandPropertyGet(header, key);
4665  }
4666  else
4667  {
4668  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
4669 
4670  // We had an error, but we may have actually changed
4671  // the state of the whitelist---so we need to report
4672  // those incomplete changes via an asynchronous
4673  // change event.
4674  HandleCommandPropertyGet(SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0, key);
4675  }
4676 
4677  return errorCode;
4678 }

5131 void NcpBase::HandleJamStateChange(bool aJamState)
5132 {
5133  ThreadError errorCode;
5134 
5135  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
5136  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
5137  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
5138  SPINEL_PROP_JAM_DETECTED,
5139  SPINEL_DATATYPE_BOOL_S,
5140  aJamState
5141  );
5142 
5143  // If we could not send the jam state change indicator (no
5144  // buffer space), we set `mShouldSignalJamStateChange` to true to send
5145  // it out when buffer space becomes available.
5146  if (errorCode != kThreadError_None)
5147  {
5148  mShouldSignalJamStateChange = true;
5149  }
5150 }

5156 {
5157  char *string(NULL);
5158  char *output(NULL);
5159  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
5160  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
5161

5166  &string
5167  );
5168 
5169  if ((parsedLength > 0) && (string != NULL))
5170  {
5171  // all diagnostics related features are processed within diagnostics module
5172  output = diagProcessCmdLine(string);
5173 
5174  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
5175  header,
5176  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
5177  key,
5178  reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>(output),
5179  static_cast<uint16_t>(strlen(output) + 1)
5180  );
5181  }
5182  else
5183  {
5184  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
5185  }
5186 
5187  return errorCode;
5188 }

5237 ThreadError NcpBase::InsertPropertyHandler_IPV6_ADDRESS_TABLE(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key,
5238  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
5239 {
5240  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
5241  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
5242  spinel_status_t errorStatus = SPINEL_STATUS_OK;
5243  otNetifAddress netif_addr;
5244  otIp6Address *addr_ptr;
5245  uint32_t preferred_lifetime;
5246  uint32_t valid_lifetime;
5247  uint8_t prefix_len;
5248 
5249  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
5250  value_ptr,
5251  value_len,
5252  "6CLL",
5253  &addr_ptr,
5254  &prefix_len,
5255  &preferred_lifetime,
5256  &valid_lifetime
5257  );
5258 
5259  VerifyOrExit(parsedLength > 0, errorStatus = SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
5260 
5261  netif_addr.mAddress = *addr_ptr;
5262  netif_addr.mPrefixLength = prefix_len;
5263  netif_addr.mPreferred = preferred_lifetime != 0;
5264  netif_addr.mValid = valid_lifetime != 0;
5265 
5266  errorCode = otAddUnicastAddress(mInstance, &netif_addr);
5267 
5268  VerifyOrExit(errorCode == kThreadError_None,
5269  errorStatus = ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
5270 
5271  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
5272  header,
5273  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_INSERTED,
5274  key,
5275  value_ptr,
5276  value_len
5277  );
5278 
5279  errorStatus = SPINEL_STATUS_OK;
5280 
5281 exit:
5282 
5283  if (errorStatus != SPINEL_STATUS_OK)
5284  {
5285  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, errorStatus);
5286  }
5287 
5288  return errorCode;
5289 }

5291 ThreadError NcpBase::InsertPropertyHandler_THREAD_LOCAL_ROUTES(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key,
5292  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
5293 {
5294  const static int kPreferenceOffset = 6;
5295  const static int kPreferenceMask = 3 << kPreferenceOffset;
5296 
5297  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
5298  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
5299 
5300  otExternalRouteConfig ext_route_config;
5301  otIp6Address *addr_ptr;
5302  bool stable = false;
5303  uint8_t flags = 0;
5304 
5305  memset(&ext_route_config, 0, sizeof(otExternalRouteConfig));
5306 
5307  VerifyOrExit(
5308  mAllowLocalNetworkDataChange == true,
5309  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_INVALID_STATE)
5310  );
5311 
5312  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
5313  value_ptr,
5314  value_len,
5315  "6CbC",
5316  &addr_ptr,
5317  &ext_route_config.mPrefix.mLength,
5318  &stable,
5319  &flags
5320  );
5321 
5322  if (parsedLength > 0)
5323  {
5324  ext_route_config.mPrefix.mPrefix = *addr_ptr;
5325  ext_route_config.mStable = stable;
5326  ext_route_config.mPreference = ((flags & kPreferenceMask) >> kPreferenceOffset);
5327  errorCode = otAddExternalRoute(mInstance, &ext_route_config);
5328 
5329  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
5330  {
5331  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
5332  header,
5333  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_INSERTED,
5334  key,
5335  value_ptr,
5336  value_len
5337  );
5338  }
5339  else
5340  {
5341  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
5342  }
5343  }
5344  else
5345  {
5346  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
5347  }
5348 
5349 exit:
5350  return errorCode;
5351 }

5353 ThreadError NcpBase::InsertPropertyHandler_THREAD_ON_MESH_NETS(uint8_t header, spinel_prop_key_t key,
5354  const uint8_t *value_ptr, uint16_t value_len)
5355 {
5356  const static int kPreferenceOffset = 6;
5357  const static int kPreferenceMask = 3 << kPreferenceOffset;
5358  const static int kPreferredFlag = 1 << 5;
5359  const static int kSlaacFlag = 1 << 4;
5360  const static int kDhcpFlag = 1 << 3;
5361  const static int kConfigureFlag = 1 << 2;
5362  const static int kDefaultRouteFlag = 1 << 1;
5363  const static int kOnMeshFlag = 1 << 0;
5364 
5365  spinel_ssize_t parsedLength;
5366  ThreadError errorCode = kThreadError_None;
5367 
5368  otBorderRouterConfig border_router_config;
5369  otIp6Address *addr_ptr;
5370  bool stable = false;
5371  uint8_t flags = 0;
5372 
5373  memset(&border_router_config, 0, sizeof(otBorderRouterConfig));
5374 
5375  VerifyOrExit(
5376  mAllowLocalNetworkDataChange == true,
5377  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_INVALID_STATE)
5378  );
5379 
5380  parsedLength = spinel_datatype_unpack(
5381  value_ptr,
5382  value_len,
5383  "6CbC",
5384  &addr_ptr,
5385  &border_router_config.mPrefix.mLength,
5386  &stable,
5387  &flags
5388  );
5389 
5390  if (parsedLength > 0)
5391  {
5392  border_router_config.mPrefix.mPrefix = *addr_ptr;
5393  border_router_config.mStable = stable;
5394  border_router_config.mPreference = ((flags & kPreferenceMask) >> kPreferenceOffset);
5395  border_router_config.mPreferred = ((flags & kPreferredFlag) == kPreferredFlag);
5396  border_router_config.mSlaac = ((flags & kSlaacFlag) == kSlaacFlag);
5397  border_router_config.mDhcp = ((flags & kDhcpFlag) == kDhcpFlag);
5398  border_router_config.mConfigure = ((flags & kConfigureFlag) == kConfigureFlag);
5399  border_router_config.mDefaultRoute = ((flags & kDefaultRouteFlag) == kDefaultRouteFlag);
5400  border_router_config.mOnMesh = ((flags & kOnMeshFlag) == kOnMeshFlag);
5401 
5402  errorCode = otAddBorderRouter(mInstance, &border_router_config);
5403 
5404  if (errorCode == kThreadError_None)
5405  {
5406  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
5407  header,
5408  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_INSERTED,
5409  key,
5410  value_ptr,
5411  value_len
5412  );
5413  }
5414  else
5415  {
5416  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, ThreadErrorToSpinelStatus(errorCode));
5417  }
5418  }
5419  else
5420  {
5421  errorCode = SendLastStatus(header, SPINEL_STATUS_PARSE_ERROR);
5422  }
5423 
5424 exit:
5425  return errorCode;
5426 }

5875 ThreadError NcpBase::StreamWrite(int aStreamId, const uint8_t *aDataPtr, int aDataLen)

5882  }
5883 
5884  if (!mDisableStreamWrite)
5885  {
5886  errorCode = SendPropertyUpdate(
5887  SPINEL_HEADER_FLAG | SPINEL_HEADER_IID_0,
5888  SPINEL_CMD_PROP_VALUE_IS,
5889  static_cast<spinel_prop_key_t>(aStreamId),
5890  aDataPtr,
5891  static_cast<uint16_t>(aDataLen)
5892  );
5893  }
5894  else
5895  {
5896  errorCode = kThreadError_InvalidState;
5897  }
5898 
5899  return errorCode;
5900 }
5901 
5902 } // namespace Thread
5903

5912 
5913  if (Thread::sNcpContext)
5914  {
5915  errorCode = Thread::sNcpContext->StreamWrite(aStreamId, aDataPtr, aDataLen);
5916  }
5917 
5918  return errorCode;
5919 }
